Class ReviewScoreTest

java.lang.Object
application.ReviewScoreTest
public class ReviewScoreTest extends Object
Test class for verifying that review scores are updated correctly when a vote is added. This test class uses a mock DatabaseHelper implementation (TestDatabaseHelper) to simulate the tests.

Each test verifies that adding a vote (either +1 or -1) properly updates the score of a specific review.

    Test that adds a vote of +1 to a review with an initial score of -1 and updates the score to 0.

    Test that adds a vote of -1 to a review with an initial score of -1 and updates the score to -2.

    Test that adds a vote of +1 to a review with an initial score of 1 and updates the score to 2.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp()
      Sets up each test before running them.

      This method creates new instances of reviews and initializes the TestDatabaseHelper with a list containing these reviews.

    • zeroVotesAddOne

      @Test public void zeroVotesAddOne() throws SQLException
      Test that adds a vote of +1 to a review with an initial score of 0 and updates the score to 1.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • zeroVotesMinusOne

      @Test public void zeroVotesMinusOne() throws SQLException
      Test that adds a vote of -1 to a review with an initial score of 0 and updates the score to -1.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • oneVoteAddOne

      @Test public void oneVoteAddOne() throws SQLException
      Test that adds a vote of +1 to a review with an initial score of 1 and updates the score to 2.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • oneVoteMinusOne

      @Test public void oneVoteMinusOne() throws SQLException
      Test that adds a vote of -1 to a review with an initial score of 1 and updates the score to 0.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • minusOneVoteAddOne

      @Test public void minusOneVoteAddOne() throws SQLException
      Test that adds a vote of +1 to a review with an initial score of -1 and updates the score to 0.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • minusOneVoteMinusOne

      @Test public void minusOneVoteMinusOne() throws SQLException
      Test that adds a vote of -1 to a review with an initial score of -1 and updates the score to -2.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs (simulated here).
